body_html:
I had this issue when trying to build from source on ubuntu 18.10, tf r1.12, cuda 10 (error just say .so.10.0 not .sp.9.0.
I got it working at last, thw whl file i attached in the other thread. Way i fixed it is to install cuda 10 with apt and also with the run file, then reboot... may not apply to your issue tho.

body:
I had this issue when trying to build from source on ubuntu 18.10, tf r1.12, cuda 10 (error just say .so.10.0 not .sp.9.0.
I got it working at last, thw whl file i attached in the other thread. Way i fixed it is to install cuda 10 with apt and also with the run file, then reboot... may not apply to your issue tho.
